page.title: 03The Local Landscape
page.content:
The landscape is full of things to see, trees, fields, hills and different kinds of buildings. The fields are pretty colours and are all shapes and sizes like a patchwork.I sometimes take a pencil and a piece of paper and go and draw the landscape.I look at all the houses and sometimes I see a ruined one.
There are lots of pretty things to see in the hedgerows round the fields, flowers and small creatures. When I look up and around I can see farm buildings and cows. The fields are all different colours. Some are green but they are not all the same green, some are yellow and some are brown. The farmers grow wheat, oats and barley.
The landscape is a very beautiful thing to look at.
